name: Taco Crawl
description:
Full stack MERN web app that generates random restaurants that serve tacos using the Yelp API
To save a crawl or individual restaurants, the user can register for an account and view their profile

name: Beer O' Slots V2
description:
Worked along with a UX-UI designer to revamp the game and made it more user friendly
Wrote javascript functions to check matching images horizontally, vertically and diagonally
